original_text: A farmer works hard to grow plants for food. So he should be the first person to receive some of that food.
korean_text: 수고하는 농부가 곡식을 먼저 받는 것이 마땅하니라

sentences.original_text: So he should be the first person
sentences.korean_translation: 그러므로 그는 첫 번째 사람이어야 합니다

sentences.original_text: to receive some of that food
